name: Mango Deathwish
description:
The only way to stay hidden is to hide from even yourself. While you all share the same screen stealth becomes a game of remembering where you are because any reveal reveals you to all players. In this stealth deathmatch players choose to be either a guard with a flashlight and gun, or ninjas with a deadly sword and who are completely invisible in the dark. The last person standing wins.

Features
  • Short five minute matches
  • Fun party game
  • Two very different roles: Ninjas and Guards
  • High skill ceiling: Can you remember exactly where you are? Or do you have to reveal.
Credits

Jonathan Semple: Creative Lead, Designer, Programmer
Brook Jensen: Programmer
Liam Gallagher: Music and Sound Design
Ryan Tan: Character and background art
